entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:13 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:01 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
